name: Exist (itch)
description:
Imagine that you can travel to a wide variety of worlds that only you can imagine! Well, it's time to go to one of these worlds! But ... You get there only in case of strong sadness. Remember, every time you find yourself there, you gradually destroy it and all who dwell there.  Moreover, getting out of a collapsing world is not so easy ...
And if You liked this please add game to your wishlist!  http://store.steampowered.com/app/804130/EXIST/?beta=0
